main.name: komarudin
main.bio: Junior programmer with more than 2 years of experience using the Laravel framework, where previously I was just a web developer using WordPress, and blogger, and now I am starting my career in PHP, Javascript, and Node JS web programming using frameworks namely Laravel, VueJS, HAPI, and Express. I enjoy learning new things in programming. Currently, I am taking several Web Developer classes, one of which is Dicoding Indonesia. I have expertise in the design, installation, testing, and maintenance of web systems with the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). In other fields, I can also operate laser-cutting machines
